title: Global Cloud Infrastructure Market Industry Analysis and Forecast (2019-2026)
excerpt: Some of the vendors for cloud infrastructure market are Cisco, Red Hat, Microsoft, Google, VMware, Rackspace, AT&T, Amazon Web Services and Bluelock. The market growth is mainly due to the growing deployment of new cloud infrastructure setups as well as upgrading of existing cloud infrastructure setups to meet the increasing demand.
